children.name: • Users are required to carefully review and understand the terms of use outlined herein. These terms govern the use of Instant Focus and its related services. By accessing or using Instant Focus, users acknowledge their acceptance and agreement to comply with these terms.

Users are required to carefully review and understand the terms of use outlined herein. These terms govern the use of Instant Focus and its related services. By accessing or using Instant Focus, users acknowledge their acceptance and agreement to comply with these terms.

• By accessing or using Instant Focus, users affirm their consent to abide by all terms and conditions set forth in this document. Users further acknowledge that their continued use of Instant Focus constitutes ongoing acceptance of any updates or modifications to these terms. Failure to comply with these terms may result in the termination of access to Instant Focus.

• Process for Creating a User Account:
Process for Creating a User Account:

• Users can create an account on Instant Focus by completing the registration process, which typically involves providing certain personal information such as name, email address, and password. The registration process may vary depending on the platform's requirements.

Users can create an account on Instant Focus by completing the registration process, which typically involves providing certain personal information such as name, email address, and password. The registration process may vary depending on the platform's requirements.

• Users must meet certain criteria to register for an account on Instant Focus, which may include being of legal age, providing accurate and current information, and agreeing to the terms of use outlined by the platform.

Users must meet certain criteria to register for an account on Instant Focus, which may include being of legal age, providing accurate and current information, and agreeing to the terms of use outlined by the platform.

• Instant Focus respects user privacy and may offer options for anonymous account creation or usage, where applicable. Users can choose to use pseudonyms or other means to maintain their anonymity within the platform.

Instant Focus respects user privacy and may offer options for anonymous account creation or usage, where applicable. Users can choose to use pseudonyms or other means to maintain their anonymity within the platform.
• Explanation of Any Limitations to Anonymity:
Explanation of Any Limitations to Anonymity:

• While Instant Focus prioritizes user privacy, certain features or functionalities may require users to provide identifiable information for account verification or security purposes. Users will be informed of any limitations to anonymity and the reasons behind such requirements.

While Instant Focus prioritizes user privacy, certain features or functionalities may require users to provide identifiable information for account verification or security purposes. Users will be informed of any limitations to anonymity and the reasons behind such requirements.

• Instant Focus may collect various types of information from users, including but not limited to: ◦ Personal information (e.g., name, email address, contact information, demographics such as race/ethnicity, political, religious, or philosophical opinions or beliefs, trade union membership, information about personal health, sexual activity, or sexual orientation or criminal history) ◦ Account credentials (e.g., username, password) ◦ Usage data (e.g., interaction with the platform, preferences, settings) ◦ Device information (e.g., IP address, browser type, operating system)

• How Collected Data Will Be Used:
How Collected Data Will Be Used:

• Instant Focus may utilize collected data in the following ways: ◦ To deliver the requested services and features ◦ To customize content and recommendations ◦ To communicate important updates or information ◦ To conduct research and analysis aimed at improving the platform ◦ To comply with legal obligations or respond to legal requests ◦ To conduct user verification ◦ To conduct research and analysis based on the information gathered during focus group sessions

• Any Third Parties with Whom Data May Be Shared:
Any Third Parties with Whom Data May Be Shared:

• Instant Focus may share collected data with third-party service providers, business partners, or affiliates for purposes such as data processing, analytics, marketing, and customer support. However, user data will not be sold or disclosed to third parties for their own marketing purposes without user consent.

Instant Focus may share collected data with third-party service providers, business partners, or affiliates for purposes such as data processing, analytics, marketing, and customer support. However, user data will not be sold or disclosed to third parties for their own marketing purposes without user consent.

• Users have the right to access their personal data collected by Instant Focus and to request corrections or deletions of inaccuracies. Additionally, users have the right to be informed about how their data is being processed and the purposes for which it is being used. To exercise these rights, users may contact Instant Focus at the provided contact information.

Users have the right to access their personal data collected by Instant Focus and to request corrections or deletions of inaccuracies. To exercise these rights, users may contact Instant Focus at the provided contact information.
• Explanation of Security Measures in Place:
Explanation of Security Measures in Place:

• Instant Focus implements industry-standard security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures may include encryption, firewalls, secure socket layer (SSL) technology, and access controls.

Instant Focus implements industry-standard security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures may include encryption, firewalls, secure socket layer (SSL) technology, and access controls.
• Protocol in Case of a Data Breach:
Protocol in Case of a Data Breach:

• In the event of a data breach or unauthorized access to user data, Instant Focus will promptly notify affected users and take necessary steps to mitigate the impact of the breach. This may include investigating the cause of the breach, implementing additional security measures, and cooperating with relevant authorities as required by law.

In the event of a data breach or unauthorized access to user data, Instant Focus will promptly notify affected users and take necessary steps to mitigate the impact of the breach. This may include investigating the cause of the breach, implementing additional security measures, and cooperating with relevant authorities as required by law.
• User Rights Regarding Content Created or Shared:
User Rights Regarding Content Created or Shared:
• Users retain ownership of the content they create or share on Instant Focus. This includes but is not limited to text, images, videos, and other materials uploaded or posted by users.
Users retain ownership of the content they create or share on Instant Focus. This includes but is not limited to text, images, videos, and other materials uploaded or posted by users.

However, this license does not grant Instant Focus ownership of the user's content.

This includes, but is not limited to, warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or any warranties arising from the course of dealing or usage of trade.

• Circumstances Under Which Accounts May Be Terminated:
Circumstances Under Which Accounts May Be Terminated:

• Instant Focus reserves the right to terminate user accounts for violations of the platform's terms of use or for any other reason deemed necessary by Instant Focus. Grounds for termination may include, but are not limited to: ◦ Violation of user conduct guidelines ◦ Breach of intellectual property rights ◦ Fraudulent or illegal activity ◦ Failure to comply with platform policies or instructions

Instant Focus reserves the right to terminate user accounts for violations of the platform's terms of use or for any other reason deemed necessary by Instant Focus. Grounds for termination may include, but are not limited to:
◦ Failure to comply with platform policies or instructions
Failure to comply with platform policies or instructions

• In the event of a termination, Instant Focus will notify the user of the termination and provide information regarding the reason(s) for termination. Users may be given an opportunity to appeal the termination decision, depending on the circumstances.

In the event of a termination, Instant Focus will notify the user of the termination and provide information regarding the reason(s) for termination. Users may be given an opportunity to appeal the termination decision, depending on the circumstances.

• Instant Focus may suspend user accounts temporarily in cases where violations of the platform's terms of use are detected or pending investigation of alleged misconduct. Suspension may be implemented to prevent further harm or to facilitate a thorough review of the situation.

Instant Focus may suspend user accounts temporarily in cases where violations of the platform's terms of use are detected or pending investigation of alleged misconduct. Suspension may be implemented to prevent further harm or to facilitate a thorough review of the situation.

• Users will be notified of the suspension and provided with details regarding the reasons for the suspension. Instant Focus may request additional information or cooperation from the user during the suspension period. Suspension may be lifted upon resolution of the underlying issues or upon completion of the investigation, depending on the outcome.

1. Provision Ensuring that if One Part of the Terms is Deemed Invalid, the Rest Remains Enforceable:
Provision Ensuring that if One Part of the Terms is Deemed Invalid, the Rest Remains Enforceable:

• If any provision of these terms of use is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions shall nevertheless remain in full force and effect. The invalid or unenforceable provision shall be replaced by a valid and enforceable provision that most closely matches the intent of the original provision.
